examples.example: 我的爷爷已经九十岁了，但他依然精神矍铄。

translate.english: My grandfather is already ninety years old, but he is still hale and hearty.

examples.example: 我的奶奶虽然九十岁了，可还是每天笑容满面，积极乐观地生活着。

translate.english: Although my grandma is ninety years old, she still smiles every day and lives actively and optimistically.

examples.example: 我的老师已经九十岁了，可他还是坚持每天读书学习。

translate.english: My teacher is already ninety years old, but he still insists on reading and studying every day.
